Email Share Prior to joining MBZUAI, Professor Horváth completed his M.Sc. (2018) and Ph.D. (2022) in statistics at King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST) in Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. He has a relatively rich industrial experience obtained via research internships, including Amazon Scalable Machine Learning, Germany (2019), Samsung AI Centre, United Kingdom (2020), and Facebook AI Research, Canada (2021).
